content: My name is Alex, and I really enjoy R. I love the R community and all of the great tools they make available.
summary: My name is Alex, and I really enjoy R. I love the R community and all of the great tools they make available.
title: Alex Whan

content:
Hello! Welcome to Interactive documents with Shiny, pretty soon we‚Äôll meet for the two day workshop. üêù
Before seeing me at the workshop, please follow the steps below to make sure everything is installed and ready to go:
If you haven‚Äôt previously used tidyverse packages such as ggplot2 or dplyr, learn the basics of data transformation and visualisation. A good resource for this is Garrett Grolemund and Hadley Wickham‚Äôs R for Data Science book.
 Please bring a laptop that has the following installed:
 A recent version of R (>=3.6.0), which is available for free at https://cloud.r-project.org/
 A recent version of RStudio Desktop (>=1.2), available for free (RStudio Desktop Open Source License)
 The R packages we will use, which you can install by connecting to the internet, opening RStudio, and running at the command line:
install.packages(c("shiny", "tidyverse", "reactlog", "shinytest", "usethis", "shinycssloaders", "shinydashboard", "shinyWidgets", "mapdeck", "DT", "gt", "shinythemes", "shinyjs", "leaflet", "plotly"))  Bring along a shiny app that you‚Äôve worked on before and would like to improve. If you haven‚Äôt created a shiny app, you can bring an R script or idea that can an app can be created for.
  During the workshop I‚Äôll provide instructions on how you can download and set up the course material.
summary: Welcome to this workshop! Before attending, follow these steps to help things go smoothly.
title: Pre-workshop preparation

summary: Abstract, learning objectives, and key questions for potential participants
title: About the workshop

Day 2    Time Activity     09:00 - 09:30 Arrive and get set up üíª   09:30 - 10:45 Session 1 üé® Application design and customisation   10:45 - 11:00 Morning tea üçµ   11:00 - 12:30 Session 2 üîó Doing more with extension packages   12:30 - 13:15 Lunch üç¥   13:15 - 15:00 Session 3 üéâ Work on your own Shiny app
